comments.body: maybe `Yes, this is a breaking change and I have sent the appropriate communications outlined in [Handling breaking changes].`

Hm, I don't want to steer people towards believing that all breaking changes are OK as long as they send out an email. I actually want them to read what's required to do them and slightly deter them from unnecessary breaking changes.

comments.body: Maybe add some examples. People may not realize what makes changes breaking (adding enum values, add new asserts etc)
